storyInfo: The others oppose Oren's plan. While they argue, Clément appears, bearing a 'gift'.

attributes.content: Raimund... wait, Raimund!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Taking you away from here.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I know what's going on. I won't let them take you!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: No need to be scared. Come with me. We'll help you—
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: N-No! I'm not scared!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Raimund! Let me go... you don't get it!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Sorry... was I hurting you?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I'm okay.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I-I decided to go with them to Laterano, Raimund.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: What are you saying? Did they threaten you? You'll die if you go there!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I deserve to!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Let me go, Raimund. No one threatened me. I killed Fina. I can't run away from this!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Delfina...? That was an accident...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: No! I don't want to hear that anymore, especially from you!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: An accident... an accident! Of course I wouldn't point a gun at Fina on purpose. It was a tragic accident... but she's dead! Dead!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: She'll never open her eyes again. She'll never speak to us again!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Fortuna, calm down... you'll hurt yourself!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I want to calm down... I don't want to be crying like this!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: But why doesn't anyone blame me? Why does everyone call it an accident? As though that means Fina's death didn't matter?!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I killed Fina! What difference does it make that it was an accident?!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Breathe. Don't hold it in.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Huff... hah...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Huff...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Feeling better?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Raimund. I shouldn't be like this, but I don't know what to do...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I only know that I can't go. I can't run away and pretend nothing happened. I can't accept that it was an accident.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: This is my sin...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: No more talking.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Don't worry about me, Raimund. It might not be that bad.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Serpilia, that Lateran emissary who came today, she was kind to me. I wasn't mistreated.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Maybe they'll lock me up when we get to Laterano.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I have horns now... I don't know if I'm Sankta anymore. It doesn't really matter if I'm not...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm fine, Raimund. You—
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I can't let it happen.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I can't just leave you like this, Fortuna—
attributes.name: Raimund
Fortuna
attributes.content: Raimund? What are you...?

attributes.name: Fortuna
attributes.content: Eek!
(Hush! Hold your breath...)
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: (Someone's coming!)
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: He hung up.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: When did you get Richele over to your side?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: That's an exaggeration. He's always been that type who only does what's good for him.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: He's even better than I am at looking out for himself...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I feel like I'm being watched...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Has your paranoia finally caused you to hallucinate, Oren?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'd rather believe that there really is someone watching in the shadows.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Just a joke. Don't look at me like that.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Where's the fallen angel you were watching?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Sound asleep, I would think.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Stay on topic.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: What were you saying about pushing the schedule forward? Not that you can't, but that's not what we agreed on.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Why the sudden change? Give me a reason.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: What difference does it make to you?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Not much, which is why I can choose not to cooperate.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Unless my memory deceives me, I have command of the troops.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I'm prepared to write a report.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You're anxious, Oren. What's the matter?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: This is a secret operation. It's not so easy to deploy troops, if the matter of the saints didn't catch His Holiness's attention.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Even then, His Holiness seems to have noticed something, and specifically sent Federico... you know how hard it is to pull wool over Federico's eyes.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Do you really think you succeeded?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Probably not.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: But I would say I know him well enough. There won't be much trouble if he doesn't pursue the matter. Our goal is just to stop everyone who wants to leave, isn't it?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: On the other hand, the beast is out of the bag the moment you give the order to attack.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Federico isn't concerned about the means, only the end.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oh, you think so?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Let me just make it clear that if you get on his bad side, I can't stop him.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: So much for camaraderie.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: A message? Who could it be at this hour...? Oh.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Who is it?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: See for yourself.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.text: Bring Oren to the narthex immediately.

attributes.content: So much for the wool.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Everything you talked about, I'll take care of. Do as I say.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: We take control of the abbey immediately. Get all available hands on it.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: ...That urgent?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: An old man has given the last sixty years of his life to the abbey. He went so far as to imprison Lateran emissaries for the sake of those Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: He suddenly became open to compromise in desperate circumstances, even proposing something so ritualistic as a final farewell... why do you think?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: That, plus some Sarkaz who are not entirely unknown, and 'visitors' hiding in the shadows...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: We have to act quickly.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I've got a bad feeling...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Take control? What does he mean... why?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Don't you understand? The Sankta lied to us!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I have to tell Gerald! I knew it! Those Laterans never intended to play nice.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: The situation has changed. It's dangerous for you to be with me. Find a safe place; I doubt they'll do anything to you immediately—
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Wait, Raimund!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: *deep breath*
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I changed my mind. I'm coming with you.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: My, my, what a coincidence to run into you two!
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I'm so glad you're safe, Lemuen.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Any news?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You look concerned, Executor Richele.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I found something that I thought warranted investigation. It has to do with the abbot, but... anyway, more investigation is needed.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: What about you, Federico? What are you doing?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Work.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Um, ok, that much is obvious... what did you find? Something to do with the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I heard last night's fire was started by angry Sarkaz. Is that true?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What's this? Rehearsing your stand-up comedy routine?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Enough jokes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Jokes?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Oren and Serpilia will be here soon.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Well, by the sound of it, you knew Oren hid on purpose from the get-go?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Obviously.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That's just his luck, isn't it? He just can't seem to get away from you, whether at the Summit of Nations or now.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I allowed Oren to act of his own accord, because the complicated situation at the Sanctilaminium Ambrosii called for a Plan B.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But maybe he needs a reminder...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: So, what's going on? I was told to come immediately and bring Oren.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Ah, there you are, Oren. Finally decided to show your face?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It's been a while, Lemuen.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Can't you be a little nicer to me? We're partners on this mission, after all.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: It's because we're partners that you're still able to talk.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Whatever your plan was, the situation here doesn't call for that kind of aggression. It's time to stop, Oren.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Couldn't you two pretend you didn't see anything, like that guy over there?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oh, er, I would prefer if you didn't drag me into this...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I will deal with Richele when we return to the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Gratias, Oren.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: As for you, Oren.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: If you truly believe there is a need for you to operate independently, you may try to persuade me.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Well, since there's no one else here, I'll cut straight to the chase.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Did you really think I wouldn't notice that you were trying to let those two kids go?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: A fallen Sankta and a Sarkaz. Even a blind man would notice.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: ...Hmph.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I've been patient for far too long.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Are you criticizing my methods?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Not at all, not at all.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But I have my own methods. We've wasted too much time here. It's we need to consider how to can get this done quickly, with no loose ends.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: And so you decided to deploy a special forces unit?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You make it sound so easy. You know full well that deploying troops and giving the order are two different things.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Do you know how hard it was to come up with a justification that even His Holiness could not rebuke?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Now, I have one.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: That Sarkaz boy—Raimund? Arson of a sacrarium is a serious offense, that's before I mention that he's Sarkaz. We're perfectly justified in seizing him and taking the investigation into our hands.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: He was not the one who set fire to the sacrarium. Your justification is baseless.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I have no need of your intervention until I uncover the truth.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The truth? Ha. Is the truth really important?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What is more rational and logical than taking control and securing order?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Did you not consider it, Federico? Is the truth really so important to you?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Did you not consider the possibility of the locals resisting, Oren?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I didn't think you'd say something so silly, Lemuen. If the Sarkaz want to resist...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: So much the better.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: The sound of knocking echoes through the hall.
The door creaks open, and the unusually bright rays of the moon pour in through the gap.
There is a figure standing in the moonlight.
Senior Federico...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Clément?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I finally found you, Senior Federico.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I was asked to bring you this...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: By whom? What is—
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The rest of the sentence vanishes into the night.
The tall and thin figure approaches, his back to the moonlight, his head bowed.
It is as if all the light in the room had converged upon him, but the overly bright light also casts a dark, suffocating shadow.
Now, Federico sees what Clément is holding.
What he said he was asked to bring to Federico.
A dagger.
Old, but no less sharp for it, once hidden in the belt of a certain someone.
Next to the dagger...
There is a package wrapped in cloth that has been dyed a deep shade of red, from which some sort of liquid continues to drip.
What is it?
It is...
The sinner, Holst Tyfindale, offers his head freely.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: The sinner had admitted responsibility for all the crimes, all the evils committed hitherto.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: He has now paid his price. All that remains is a band of insignificant vagrants.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Will the reverend emissaries of Laterano show grace and mercy?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Senior Federico... I bring you Gerald's last words.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: He begs you take the head of the fugitive Holst and his weapon...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: In exchange, spare Fortuna and Raimund...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Spare the other Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Clément
